Package com.sap.dirigible.repository.db.dao

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBFile
    Internal representation of a File/Resource kind of object
    DBFileDAO  
    DBFileVersion
    Internal representation of a File/Resource kind of object
    DBFileVersionDAO  
    DBFolder
    Internal representation of a Folder/Collection kind of object
    DBFolderDAO  
    DBMapper
    Utility class for transformation between JDBC related objects to DB Repository objects and vice-versa
    DBObject
    The base of domain objects in the DB Repository implementation
    DBObjectDAO  
    DBRepositoryDAO
    Utility class for direct database manipulation via JDBC Base tables: DGB_FILES - the files and folder registry DGB_DOCUMENTS - the content of text files separated by chunks DGB_BINARIES - the content of binary files DGB_SCHEMA_VERSIONS - the version of the current repository schema
    DBRepositoryInitializer
    Initialize the database schema of Repository Supports incremental alteration of the schema
    DBScriptsMap
    The static map for the scripts locations Intentionally the active scripts are registered in this class
    DBSearchDAO  
    Messages
